content: materials needed * g hook 4 0mm crochet hook * aqua blue colored yarn i used red heart super saver in turqua * white yarn * dark blue/ navy yarn * light yellow yarn * black craft felt * white craft felt * hot glue/ tacky glue optional instead of glue you can use a felting needle * fiber fil stuffing * scissors * yarn needle for sewing finished object should measure around 9 inches tall
